title: Neural Dashboard
description: A real-time analytics dashboard built with React, D3.js, and Firebase. Features dark-mode UI, live data streaming, and customizable widgets for business intelligence.

title: EcoTrack App
description: A mobile application for tracking carbon footprint and promoting sustainable habits. Built with React Native and integrated with health APIs.

title: CodeFlow IDE
description: A browser-based integrated development environment with syntax highlighting, auto-completion, and collaborative editing features. Built with Monaco Editor and WebSockets.

title: QuantumChat
description: A secure, end-to-end encrypted messaging platform with self-destructing messages and quantum-resistant cryptography concepts.

title: DataVault
description: A secure cloud storage solution with client-side encryption, multi-factor authentication, and file versioning. Designed for enterprise use.

title: AI Resume Builder
description: An intelligent resume generator that analyzes job descriptions and tailors resumes accordingly using NLP and machine learning models.
